sentences.sentence: But we have not yet learned to manage our materialism and carnality properly;
sentences.translation: 世间的生活是物质的和世俗的，也应该是物质的、世俗的。

sentences.sentence: Rodin's depiction insists on the carnality of love. So do Hogarth's paired paintings Before and After.
sentences.translation: 罗丹着重描绘的是欲之爱，就像荷加斯的那两幅画：《之前》和《之后》。
